message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary piece is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe its true value surpasses $15000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at this price. Please let me know if you would like to explore this opportunity further.
